choose.when: (name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') OR depname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE ( ID , NAME, PW, JOINDAY, PHONE, POSNO, DEPNO, AUTHNO ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{pw}, NOW(), #{phone}, #{ posno }, #{ depno }, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT e.empno, e.name, e.posno, e.depno, e.phone, p.posname, d.depname FROM EMPLOYEE e, POSITION p, DEPARTMENT d where deleted ='N' and e.posno = p.posno and e.depno = d.depno order by empno ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYEE where deleted ='N'

SELECT e.empno, e.name, e.posno, e.depno, e.phone, p.posname, d.depname FROM EMPLOYEE e, POSITION p, DEPARTMENT d WHERE e.deleted = 'N' and e.posno = p.posno and e.depno = d.depno
ORDER BY empno DESC limit #{beginning}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET posno = #{ posno }, depno = #{ depno } WHERE id = #{ id }
